website_summaries.verdict: These pouches are perfect for parents who need something to feed baby while on the go.
pros: Pouches make it easy to feed while away from home
cons: The texture doesn't work for some babies

website_summaries.verdict: Provides a good balance of organic fruits and vegetables in a convenient pouch.
pros: This pack contains 4 fruit and veggie blends
BPA-free packaging with a resealable lid
cons: Flavor may not appeal to all babies

customer_reviews.title: Parent beware...possible rancid food
customer_reviews.text: I fed my baby several packages of this food with no problem. Then yesterday he ate the food and then threw the food up for hours afterward, into the night. Upon inspecting the pouch that I had thrown away, it smelled and tasted bad. It had gone bad even though the expiration date says October 2020, 3 months from now. Be careful. Always inspect pre packaged food before you feed your baby!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short expiration date 2.5 months (ordered end of May 2018 expire mid Aug 2018)
customer_reviews.text: Baby ate all of the flavors. He liked the purple one with the pears, carrot, and blueberries especially. The one thing that I didn't like is that the expiration date for all of them were only 2.5 months from when I received them! All three flavors came boxed separately but all three had pretty much the same expiration date +/- two days. Normally when I buy baby food from target or walmart or safeway it has an expiration date of at least 1 year sometimes even 2 years out. 2.5 months seems really short.
customer_reviews.author: Hawn Girl

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try if you have picky eater and /or dont have access to these varieties.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to help her get some of her daily vegetable intact since she is so sooooo darn picky. Was skeptical, because well I mean the pear pea spinach doesnt look appetizing at all (all green pear sauce lol.) Turns out my very picky toddler loves these. It is convenient to go out with. Packaging was well boxed and protected when recieved too. Nothing expired or looking weird. I subscribed for a box every two months bc we are stationed overseas and we dont exactly have access to this here but i am very much considering to do it every month instead. Never hurts to try.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Huertas

customer_reviews.title: Received not what I’ve ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a variety pack which was advertised to have 6 packs of pear, purple carrot, blueberry; 6 packs of banana and pumpkin ; 6 packs of pear, spinach and pea. What I got is 6 packs of sweet potatoes, apple and corn; 6 packs of pear and mango; 6 packs of pear, purple carrot and blueberry. Received not what I’ve ordered!!
customer_reviews.author: A. A

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go!
customer_reviews.text: Most of the time I make my own baby food but if we are out and about we bring jess with us and they’re great. My kiddo loves all the combinations, and sometimes it’s easier to introduce him to a new food by using something premade if it’s somehing difficult to prepare at home. Love that these are convenient for travel and that I can just squeeze a mouthful ontona spoon and feed my baby wherever we are. Also love that they’re organic and simple ingredients. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TWald88

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter has been eating these since 4 months. They are so convenient, pretty healthy, and she eats the whole pack with 0 issues. She is completely not picky in regards to food. Amazon delivery in bulk to the door is much more convenient that picking up at the store. We have them on subscription
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy, organic baby food with creative flavors
customer_reviews.text: I keep these on hand for my 9 month old, as easy food to pack for on-the-go or quick snacks when I don't have something made for her. The packaging was better than other baby food deliveries I've had, each flavor came in its own box with a tear away section for easy cupboard storing and access. The flavors are creative and a good fruit/veggie combination, though the main flavor/ingredient is always fruit (seems to be the case for all the big baby food companies) rather than the vegetables, but these make it very easy to introduce new flavors/ingredients without a lot of waste.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Ahearn

customer_reviews.title: So handy as a snack
customer_reviews.text: I carry these when I need a quick snack on the road, sooo refreshing. I occasionally add a bit to my dog’s food, only as a treat, don’t over do it if you do try it, could cause diarrhea!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but way too much vitamin A if you give more than one packet a day
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (8 months old) likes all the flavors. She can't control the packet holding it herself yet, but there are spoon and straw attachments you can get to feed your baby easily. The reason it's not 5 stars is because all of these have so much Vitamin A - all are over the 100% daily amount. So if I give her two packets, she's getting over 200% the recommended vitamin A. It would be much better if at least one of the flavors was some other vegetable, fruit, or grain combo that didn't have vitamin A (like apple and oatmeal, for example).
customer_reviews.author: Sara J.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 month old recently started eating these. She seems to love them, so I tried them... They're tasty! I love the little pouch. I just squeeze a bit on the spoon and she eats it like that. She's too little to eat it directly from the pouch (without making a mess). These are great to take with you on a picnic! Try them!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Wilmes

customer_reviews.title: Delicious,  even my hubby likes them.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. Definitely saved multiple trips to the store and much more affordable ( I live in hawaii where everything is over priced! ) great for car travel but if you are flying the pouches are too big. I had a nice TSA person, who let me keep 3 of the pouches. (Which is all that I had on me, I was going to purchase more when I arrived in mainland)
customer_reviews.author: LA'ALOA

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for great tasting food for baby! Only reason I got these is because we are going on a trip and will work great! Will def purchase from Amazon again!
customer_reviews.author: LITTLE JOE

customer_reviews.title: Funky taste
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cause it was a good deal but I do taste test before I give to my babies to make sure... taste of each flavor was kinda funky.. I hate wasting food but after a few pouches I unfortunately ended up throwing the rest out cause the quality did not meet what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: I AM VERY DISAPPOINTED IN THE FLAVORS THE PUMPKINS& BANANA IS SO POTENT ...
customer_reviews.text: I AM VERY DISAPPOINTED IN THE FLAVORS THE PUMPKINS& BANANA IS SO POTENT TIL IT'S NOT TOLERABLE VERY STRONG AFTER TASTE. AND THE PEAR SPINACH & PEAS ARE BITTER. THE PURPLE CARROT BLUEBERRY TASTE GOOD & MY 14 MONTH OLD GRAND SON, LIKES ONLY THAT ONE. PLS TAKE MY ADVISE, I TASTE IT SO I KNOW WHY HE DOESN'T LIKE IT. I WILL SEND IT BACK.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Gooden

customer_reviews.title: Not the right flavors
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these a couple times and baby loves them but this last box had two boxes of the purple carrot/blueberry flavor and no banana/pumpkin flavor so I was a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H.

customer_reviews.title: Bad for the Environment, Good for Busy Parents
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. She likes them all but I think her favorite is the Banana Pumpkin. I love them too because they're so convenient when I want to get some nutrients in her real fast. I do feel bad about the plastic waste but just can't stop using them.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Moore

customer_reviews.title: Taste good to Baby and Mom
customer_reviews.text: Baby really likes these. Sometimes I still put this on a spoon to feed. But if we are in a store then she gets it squeezed into her mouth. She is not able to eat from them on her own. She is 8 months old.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and portable!
customer_reviews.text: These pouches are highly recommended in my opinion. Not only are they really good but are very convenient to travel with. My son loves just about every fruit n veggie kind and I love that they are healthy for him. Took these on a trip on a plane and eas very happy I did. No mess and happy baby great combination!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Easy, convenient, and nutritious!
customer_reviews.text: As a working mom, I didn't have the time to make my own baby food, so I turned to plum organics to do the job for me. I wanted something easy and healthy. I taste all the baby foods I buy before giving them to my little one and plum organics pouches actually taste like the ingredients listed on the pouch and doesn't have any additives. My baby loves these, even the pea, spinach, and pear one- which I'm not a fan of, but if baby is happy, then mom is happy.
customer_reviews.author: dchang10

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My sunshine absolutely loves these! They have great ingredients, no crap, and its perfect if we’re going somewhere, also I love the price here on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Martinka

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: These arrived safely packed in a carton box separate from their original boxes. I firstly decided to try my little one with the I've I thought would taste the worst and that's the spinach. He consumed the entire thing in almost one go. He's 8 months old and for the most part I make his food so this is my first time trying anything else. I will most definitely be repurchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: Kenesha

customer_reviews.title: Handy baby food to always have in hand
customer_reviews.text: These packets are great. This kiddo likes different flavors. But I’m sure I’ll find something she likes that Plum!
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great Combinations
customer_reviews.text: I Love Plum Organics. I have used this brand for all three of my children. I can trust in the quality of Plum Organics and not have to research every purchase. I have used another top organic brand for stage one foods for all of my children, but I always return to Plum Organics. Plum Organics does a great job at finding awesome combinations of fruits and vegetables. My seventh month old is loving the combinations.
customer_reviews.author: H. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great variety and packaging, doesn't expire until 7 months from purchase date!
customer_reviews.text: Great variety and packaging! One of the best I've received, especially since they don't expire for 7 months from purchase date! My nephew absolutely loves the flavors!
customer_reviews.author: Orlene

customer_reviews.title: Not the best tasting!
customer_reviews.text: I got a good deal on there which i was so happy about and they arrived on time. I'm very disappointed in the taste of the green pouch. It is foul and repulsive. I was wondering why my son wasn't indulging in his pouch as he normally does with others. So I tasted it, I had to quickly drink something to get the taste out of my mouth! It was horrendous! The purple isn't much better...but edible. And the yellow is good as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Healthy meals and snacks that are great for road trips
customer_reviews.text: Healthy meals and snacks that are great for road trips. Can re-cap it and throw it in the cooler if needed. No chance of leaking and no mess. My 1 year old twin Grandsons love all the different flavors and eat 'em up without hesitation. They even hold the packet themselves and figured out they have to squeeze it from the bottom up if they want more. Greatest baby food packaging invention ever!
customer_reviews.author: DLO

customer_reviews.title: Great for Traveling
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to send for my baby to daycare. It fits in his lunchbox with his frozen milk pouches and it's great to throw one in the diaper bag when we're on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H. Bettinger

customer_reviews.title: Taste delicious and son loves all 3
customer_reviews.text: I'll eat the banana pumpkin for a snack, it's so good! 6 month old seems to love these and I will definitely keep ordering. Only thing I didn't like is that on the back of the pouches it says the packing isn't BPA free. Not something you like to see.
customer_reviews.author: TTBB33

customer_reviews.title: Easy & health way to feed your baby
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these! She can feed herself and has been able to with these pouches since 6 or 7 months old. It’s so easy to throw one in a bag if you plan on being out for a couple of hours. It’s very convenient being able to just screw off the top and let her feed herself. I do wish the packaging was recyclable though.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great product, happy baby girl, happy mommy
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product!!! My daughter loves it and I am so glad I can get it on Amazon. My daughter eats it up! It helps her digestion too. I cook her foods but sometimes you need some pouches to go or just don’t have the time or energy to Mamie foods. This is a nice way to get variety and feed your kids healthy items.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Baby started feeding herself with these around 7 months old. Very convenient snack for car or out and about!
customer_reviews.author: alionbk

customer_reviews.title: Great pouch for babies to toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My son loves pouches...all pouches really but we have this brand on standing order monthly and will keep ordering. He is almost 2 now so we reserve them for car snacks and days we need to cram a few extra veggies into his diet
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Very yummy!
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves plum organics. We have tried a few of the fruit and veggies mixes from other brands and he won't eat them. But he loves this one. I didn't buy it for being organic, I was just looking for a stage 2 food he would eat and I think we finally found a wide variety of flavors he likes from this brand. He always made kind of a sour face with other foods. He doesn't do that with this brand. He seems to like evey flavor we have tried. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: great but
customer_reviews.text: Bought these before the pandemic hit and thank God!! She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: LOVE

customer_reviews.title: They are great for on the go snacks
customer_reviews.text: My LO loves these snacks. They are great for on the go snacks. I like the ingredients and cheaper on amazon then in the store. So it is great I can purchase a lot at one time and don’t have to worry about running out.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact I got this at a great price! $15.52. In stores 1 Individual pack is $1.69 Ea BUT The price went up to $26 now. My son eats everything & this is the perfect snack for him.
customer_reviews.author: christina brown

customer_reviews.title: Happy Grandbaby
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved it and will be ordering more. Love the variety and have my daughter hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Louisa Villamar

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes these over other brands
customer_reviews.text: Baby Loves these packs over happy baby and earths best. She always finishes them vs gets tired of the other ones mid pack. I think it’s because they mix veggies which fruits which are also little sweeter. We only use these on vacation. Baby has home made food at home
customer_reviews.author: Natalia A

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These tastes horrible. Like, bitter. The only flavor that tastes ok is the banana. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: LimSahar

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves all the flavors! I actually tasted it myself and it doesn't taste like the old school baby food that my parents used to give to my baby brother. I wouldn't mind using this as one of those baby shower games too!
customer_reviews.author: short.stack76

customer_reviews.title: Expiration dates beware
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but will never buy online again...the expiration dates were about a month away. I will continue to buy them in store. Just not online.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M.

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves them
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves them! Even I think they all taste great, especially the banana and pumpkin. I love that it's preservative free and organic. Very convenient and the pouch is substantial.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Great flavors
customer_reviews.text: My son couldn't get enough of these flavors. Such good ones!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I have a two year old and a three year old, and getting them to eat enough of the veggies/fruit recommended for them is a daily battle. These are life savers in those situations! They both love the taste and we go through them quickly. They both ask for "pouches" on a regular basis when they want a snack. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good first food!
customer_reviews.text: The Plum brand seems more watery than the Peter Rabbit brand. I add some baby whole grain oatmeal to thicken it up so that it is not so messy. Also, my son is almost a year old and seems to prefer thicker foods now.
customer_reviews.author: LovingAmazonPrime

customer_reviews.title: Great way to package baby food!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these things! I really like how they're packaged. Much easier to store and re use than the normal jars/plastic containers of baby food. Also easier to get the perfect bite for a baby onto a spoon. We were paying slightly more than we paid for Gerber food, but it's well worth it. And the baby likes all of the flavors. Can't complain!
customer_reviews.author: cmax

customer_reviews.title: Too sour
customer_reviews.text: The entire selection is super sour, and this is coming from a mom who loves sour stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Varga

customer_reviews.title: Best deal ever
customer_reviews.text: It came on time as ordered & was well packaged and everything is in date until Oct & Nov this year. Great price for 18 packs. I will be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Nickole lane

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome price & such a good product! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Sergent

customer_reviews.title: You can taste a hint of whatever flavor it's supposed to be but they all thavr that sweet, sour and citrus taste to it
customer_reviews.text: So the main problem I have with this is that they all taste similar. You can taste a hint of whatever flavor it's supposed to be but they all thavr that sweet, sour and citrus taste to it. Every time I feed my baby this she cringes. I rather just feed her fresh mashed avocados.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these
customer_reviews.text: Much cheaper then buying in the store. They have been great for on the go or just at home.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Pride

customer_reviews.title: Love how convenient these pouches are
customer_reviews.text: Love how convenient these pouches are. Love that they are organic and have a wide variety of flavors. I just wish there were more flavors that included meat.
customer_reviews.author: TwinMom

customer_reviews.title: Love these pouches
customer_reviews.text: Love these pouches!! I never leave home without a few in the diaper bag. I like them because my baby can just suck the food right out of the pouch so when traveling and out shopping she can have a quick snack without making a huge mess. I love how these are available on the subscribe and save as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon T

customer_reviews.title: Weston Approved
customer_reviews.text: Loved these! I’m one of those crazy moms that eats fast food but wants their child to eat the healthiest and best option so I’m so happy with these! He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fruit/Veggie Product
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren really like these fruit/veggies packs. It's their favorite. They look forward to their "veggies". We have been on auto ship for a few years. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: We love Plum. As much as my 1 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: We love Plum. As much as my 1 year old can be brand loyal, Plum is his favorite. These fruit/veg blends are great. He love the purple carrot one, I use the pear one selectively if he is having trouble going to the bathroom and the pumpkin banana is super simple and great.
customer_reviews.author: T. Haykin

customer_reviews.title: Good pack for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Plum Organic pouches, good price, practical, and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and value
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month son LOVES these! We love all the flavors in this combination pack. I've even tried them all, and they have really good flavor. This is the only combo pack that we like, and the cost is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: taradactyl

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting these at the store for my grandson and he loves them. I love the convenience of having a larger box delivered to the house by amazon. Great value and convenient! Love organic!
customer_reviews.author: P. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: 6 month old doesn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: 6 month old doesn’t like it - just makes a face and doesn’t eat it - you gotta think it tastes better than oatmeal which he likes - but there you go
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughters favorite pouches
customer_reviews.text: the flavors are great. We buy the variety pack and 10 month old loves them! She gets so excited when she sees the pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t receive one of each flavor
customer_reviews.text: There was supposed to be one box of each flavor. I received two boxes of pear, purple carrot, and blueberry, one box of pear, spinach, and pea and no box of banana and pumpkin.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Neilson

customer_reviews.title: 2 flavors
customer_reviews.text: I clearly chose the option with 3 flavors yet stuck with 2 boxes of banana pumpkin. Not only a disgusting combo, but I need the 3 different flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Lux

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these organic, non GMO baby food pouches. My baby and toddler love them. It gives them fruit and veggies in one great pouch. My kiddos just suck the food right out of the package like a straw. Love knowing my kids are eating safe, healthy food and it tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Shopper

customer_reviews.title: My baby thinks they’re yummy
customer_reviews.text: A good variety at a better price than what I get from my local stores - also, my baby eats all three flavors happily (and he’s pretty picky!)
customer_reviews.author: weksa12

customer_reviews.title: This is favorite product for our little one
customer_reviews.text: This is favorite product for our little one! I love that plum organics uses ingredients that i normally wouldn't make for my child which means she gets to add flavors to her pallet. Love that the products are organic and no additives. Its a great item to take when your out and about for your child. My child is almost 2 years old and this is my way to add a veggie when it is needed!
customer_reviews.author: R. H. Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Watch for added ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I like these flavor combinations, but read the ingredient labels closely -- some of Plum Organics baby food pouches have pureed apple as the primary ingredient, even when apple isn't supposed to be one of the main flavors... Pretty sure that adds a lot of sugar.
customer_reviews.author: jana fr

customer_reviews.title: Loved by my kids
customer_reviews.text: Loved by both the baby and 3 year old. Got on a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kyliak

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids with all ages
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it, even she is three years old already. She is a meat lover, so we always give her a pouch after meal. all three flavor seems tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chuang

customer_reviews.title: kids love these things
customer_reviews.text: My kids will power through these things like a juice box. Incredibly healthy and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Raymond

customer_reviews.title: I do love Earth's Best
customer_reviews.text: First try wasn't a hit, but we'll try try again. I do love Earth's Best, and found it no surprise that veggies were not immediately welcomed. The food smells great and organic is all we're feeding our little girl. Give it a try (or two or three)!
customer_reviews.author: H Mathis

customer_reviews.title: My son loved it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for my 8 months old son. He absolutely loved it! Great combination of flavors. He even ate peas and spinach one; pear is a lovely addition to the veggies that he normally spits out. Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Valentin Andreev

customer_reviews.title: My 9 month old son would have a horrible reaction to all flavors
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old son would have a horrible reaction to all flavors. He would enjoy the 1st bites and then arch his back like in pain and cry and be fussy. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Bueno

customer_reviews.title: Good variety of plum organics pouches
customer_reviews.text: Good variety of plum organics pouches. Perfect for my one year old. Easy to hold. The top twists off easily. Not over priced. I will continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: MaryCatherine

customer_reviews.title: Our 8 month old has loved these the past 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 month old has loved these the past 2 months. We mix them with oatmeal for breakfast. Big fan!
customer_reviews.author: Alana C.

customer_reviews.title: Both of my kids love these! Even though they are now 2 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Both of my kids love these! Even though they are now 2 and 5, it’s a great snack to stash in my purse or car for a quick healthy snack.
customer_reviews.author: zpopes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. I always try food before my baby. It was all pretty good. My little girl loves all three. Her favorite is the pear, purple carrot and blueberry. Expiration dates are great too. May of next year was the earliest.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Big size and taste great
customer_reviews.text: Toddler loves them and they are a great size for a older one.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Open pouches in box
customer_reviews.text: Usually satisfied with this product but this shipment was ruined by a pouch being opened somehow. There was dried up baby food in the bottom of the box and on some of the pouches when we opened it.
customer_reviews.author: JoWat

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves them and they came in a box that can be used to store them in the pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Bubblegum

customer_reviews.title: Only received 1 box.
customer_reviews.text: Only recieved the banana pumpkin box. Did not receive the other 2 flavors. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not just for babies
customer_reviews.text: These taste delicious and are very reasonably priced. They also are slightly bigger than most of these type that you'd buy in the grocery store. I plan on buying them on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: M. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: They are wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. I read other reviews stating that the ingredient list was unsatisfactory ect ect. I read all the ingredients and none of them had apple in them. I'm not sure what other reviewers were talking about. They are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive variety veggie pack! Only 1 flavor
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the variety veggie pack and I received only the pea,spinach, pear !!
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Why are pouches so expensive???
customer_reviews.text: My child goes through pouches in seconds and they don't seem to satisfy him. Also, they are so expensive. I would give it a higher rating if only it were a little more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Samwise

customer_reviews.title: Expired food
customer_reviews.text: Be aware of the expiration dates!!!! Or if the packages are different than what you’ve purchased recently
customer_reviews.author: Andres M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No problems here with expiration dates. Grandson is loving the banana pumpkin.
customer_reviews.author: Mills

customer_reviews.title: I love that they're convenient to bring out with us
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES these! He just started stage 2 and loves these flavors. I love that they're convenient to bring out with us
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Phillips

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these pouches for easy on-the-go feeding. It helps me fill fruit/veggie gaps when we're eating out or I can't prep a whole food. My kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: MrsEarnest

customer_reviews.title: Kids
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but this is the only way my lids will eat veggies, for now
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Anne Hays

customer_reviews.title: otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves the, except for the banana one. Not sure why, otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Tejada

customer_reviews.title: Kid loved them
customer_reviews.text: They are super messy, so just don't give them to your kid unless you are ready or they know how to handle them. Otherwise they are great and our kid loved them
customer_reviews.author: Molonlabe

customer_reviews.title: Must be delicious
customer_reviews.text: My daughter can't get enough of these! Really nice to have these in the pantry for a quick snack, on the road, or anytime my toddler is being picky about her greens. She loves these - such a treat for her!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: ... buying these for my kids for years and they love them! Great experience
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these for my kids for years and they love them! Great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Nut Lover

customer_reviews.title: Healthy quick snack
customer_reviews.text: Great source of fruits and vegetables for my picky children. They love these as a quick snack.
customer_reviews.author: LovinLifeInCO

customer_reviews.title: Check the expiration dates!
customer_reviews.text: Check the expiration dates. These were expired two weeks by the time I got them. I don’t give my child expired food. I couldn’t even donate them to the food bank. Waste of time/money.
customer_reviews.author: Fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this squeezable food. Price is a ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this squeezable food. Price is a little bit expensive, Cost a bit more than the store. But the product arrive the next day
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price for these! My toddler loves these and I will be buying on line again for this price!!
customer_reviews.author: Lora Cicciarelli

customer_reviews.title: Weird coloring
customer_reviews.text: The banana and pumpkin blend had a weird green color when the first bit came out of the packaging...unsure if this is normal, however I did not feel comfortable feeding this to my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expired product
customer_reviews.text: When my product came it was expired. It took me about a week to realize it too. I’m super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy-Lu

product_meta.title: Plum Organics Stage 2, Organic Baby Food, Fruit and Veggie Variety Pack, 4 Ounce pouches (Pack of 18)
product_meta.description:
Style:Pack of 18| Flavor:Variety Pack| Size:4 Ounce (Pack of 18)Plum Organics Second Blends is a stage 2 organic baby food line. With blends of pure fruit and veggies, our organic baby food pouches are perfect for exposing your little foodie to unique flavors and colors. Using only non-GMO, organic ingredients, the gently cooked blends are all unsalted, unsweetened, and kosher parve. And since our pouches are resealable, you can customize portion sizes that are perfect for your baby. Your little ones will love this variety pack of yummy flavors, including Pear, Spinach & Pea; Pear, Purple Carrot & Blueberry; and Banana & Pumpkin! 

At Plum Organics, we're not Just delivering nourishing, organic food to your little ones...we're making the world a better place! As a B Corp, we believe in using business as a force for good, and that includes our commitment to sustainability. Our non-BPA pouches has a smaller overall environmental footprint than glass jars, using less energy and generating less greenhouse gases during their lifecycle. While there is no recyclable pouch film in existence yet (we're working on it!), the caps on our pouches are recyclable and help to prevent food waste. By using our pouches, you're sharing in our commitment to leaving a "baby-sized" footprint on the planet. Visit plumorganics.com/sustainability to learn more about our recycling program and commitment to sustainability.

This variety pack of environmentally Plum Organics Second Blends stage 2 baby food pouches ships as 6 4-ounce pouches each of our 3 organic fruit and veggie puree blends (Pear, Spinach & Pea; Pear, Purple Carrot & Blueberry; and Banana & Pumpkin).
feature_bullets: Organic Baby Food: Made with non GMO, 2 to 4 grams of fiber, and organic fruits and veggies in baby friendly blends. Plus, they're unsalted, unsweetened, and kosher parve
Great Blends of Fruits & Veggies for Stage 2 Feeding: Pear, Spinach & Pea; Pear, Purple Carrot & Blueberry; and Banana & Pumpkin are fun, yummy, and real the perfect way to easily introduce new foods
Resealable pounches are Easy to Use: Non BPA, child safe, and with a recyclable cap, our pounches can serve as much yummy, nutritious food as baby needs at home or on the go
We're A B Corp: At Plum Organics, we're committed to our customers and our planet, and are focused on sustainable product design and safe ingredient sourcing

Variety Pack of 18 pounches: This item ships as a pack of 18 4 ounce pounches (includes 6 pounches of Pear, Spinach & Pea; 6 pounches of Pear, Purple Carrot & Blueberry; and 6 pounches of Banana & Pumpkin)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
